trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ItemClicked> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ItemClicked>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> named `ToolStrip1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>名为`ToolStrip1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ItemClicked> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ItemClicked>事件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemClickedEventArgs" /> class, specifying the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemClickedEventArgs" /> 类的新实例，同时指定单击的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the item that was clicked on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 上被单击的项。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ItemClicked?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ItemClicked?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> named `ToolStrip1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>名为`ToolStrip1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ItemClicked?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ItemClicked?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。
